select nextval('tb_file_list_check_no'::regclass) as seqNo
INSERT INTO PUBLIC.TB_FILE_LIST ( seq_no,CO_ID, upd_id, file_nm, file_path, file_type, insert_dtm, file_size ) VALUES ( #seqNo# ,#coId#, #userId#, #fileNm#, #filePath#, #fileType#, #insertDate#, #fileSize# )
